com.hippikon.security
Class PolicyStore

java.lang.Object
  com.hippikon.security.PolicyStore
public abstract class PolicyStore
extends java.lang.Object

The PolicyStore represents a list of permissions defined for ProtectedResource objects hosted within a product.

A policy store entry must list each ProtectedResource class and may define permissions for principals such as the roles a user may be assigned, or a assocation between a specific user and an instance of a ProtectedResource.

Since:
JDK 1.2.2
Version:
$Id: PolicyStore.html,v 1.1.1.1 2005/06/20 21:00:54 dalehippikon Exp $
Author:
Dale Churchett

Method Detail

getPermissions

protected abstract PermissionSet getPermissions(java.util.LinkedList resourcePath,
                                                java.util.List principals)
                                         throws ResourceNotFoundException
Returns the PermissionSet for a list of ProtectedResource entries in the PolicyStore within an AuthorizationContext. The list represents the object hierachy described in the store, which should mirror the domain class model of the application hosting the ProtectedResource objects.

Parameters:
resourcePath - a LinkedList of names representing the tree hierachy of one or more ProtectedResource entries in the PolicyStore
principals - the list of principals of a user as determined by the Policy implementations bound to each ProtectedResource in the list. These may also include the roles assigned to a user within the product hosting the resources being accessed.
Returns:
the complete PermissionSet of the access attempt within the context of the object hierachy and AuthorizationContext
Throws:
ResourceNotFoundException - thrown if the resourcePath is not defined in the PolicyStore for the AuthorizationContext

getPermissions

protected abstract PermissionSet getPermissions(java.util.LinkedList resourcePath,
                                                com.hippikon.security.PolicyMediator mediator)
                                         throws ResourceNotFoundException
Returns the PermissionSet for a list of ProtectedResources, and ensures the security Policy plugin classes are invoked in the correct order.

Parameters:
resourcePath - a LinkedList of names representing the tree hierachy of one or more ProtectedResource entries in the PolicyStore
Throws:
ResourceNotFoundException - thrown if the resourcePath is not defined in the PolicyStore for the AuthorizationContext

getDefinedPrincipals

public abstract java.util.List getDefinedPrincipals()
Returns a sorted List of the unique principals defined in a policy store implementation.

Returns:
a List of sorted String objects
